institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Global Job Support Business Rules/Article 15 (Selection Committee)
contents: Article 15 (Selection Committee) ① In order to select the operating agency under Article 14, an operating agency selection committee (hereinafter referred to as *Selection Committee) may be formed and operated., ② The selection committee is organized by country of employment, type of employment, etc. ③ The selection committee is composed of 4 to 7 members (hereinafter referred to as *selection committee members), and the method of selecting the chairperson is separately determined by the chairman. Revised September 11, 2020, ④ The selection committee members are appointed by the Chairman of the Board from among government agencies, academia, industry, labor experts, and Corporation employees. However, those who are involved in corruption such as receiving money or entertainment, illegal lobbying, breach of trust or embezzlement, or those who are judged to be unable to conduct fair deliberations are excluded., ⑤ Deleted September 11, 2020, ⑥ Other details related to the operation of the selection committee The chairman decides separately.
